attributes.action: Changing Public Opinions on Mental Health
attributes.additional_details:
I believe that the government should, make people more aware of the illlnes. So they will not be marginalised from their community and will be on the way to recovery long term.
 In a recent survey, by Dignity In Care campaign, 49% of these suffering  individuals has been harassed or attacked.
What does it say of the great londoners?
Are we to be lovable or to radiate love?
